screen.content:
<!--<import src="https://admin.nanc.io/components/buttons/large_button"/>-->

<!-- ? ========================= DATA ========================= -->
<data id="colors"
      royalBlue="{{ page.royal_blue_color }}"
      grey="{{ page.grey_color }}"
      white="{{ page.white_color }}"
      black="{{ page.black_color }}"
      transparentGrey="#6C6C7282"
/>

<data id="stores"
      googleBadge="{{ page.google_play_badge }}"
      appleBadge="{{ page.app_store_badge }}"
      googleLink="{{ page.google_play_link }}"
      appleLink="{{ page.app_store_link }}"
/>

<data id="fonts"
      main="{{ page.font_family }}"
/>

<!-- ? ========================= TEMPLATES ========================= -->

<!-- ? ========================= Buttons ========================= -->
<template id="buttons.store">
  <aspectRatio ratio="3.3571">
    <stack>
      <image ref="{{ template.image }}"/>
      <positioned all="0">
        <material type="transparency">
          <prop:borderRadius all="6"/>
          <inkWell onPressed="browser: {{ template.link }}">
            <prop:borderRadius all="6"/>
          </inkWell>
        </material>
      </positioned>
    </stack>
  </aspectRatio>
</template>

<template id="buttons.play">
  <stack>
    <positioned all="0">
      <center>
        <container size="70" color="#9AFFFFFF">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </center>
    </positioned>
    <positioned all="0">
      <center>
        <container size="60" color="#B4FFFFFF">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </center>
    </positioned>
    <positioned all="0">
      <center>
        <container size="50" color="#FFFFFF">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </center>
    </positioned>
    <positioned all="0">
      <center>
        <icon icon="mdi_play_box" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}"/>
      </center>
    </positioned>
    <sizedBox size="70">
      <material type="transparency">
        <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
        <inkWell onPressed="browser: {{ template.videoLink }}">
          <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
        </inkWell>
      </material>
    </sizedBox>
  </stack>
</template>

<template id="buttons.icon">
  <stack>
    <padding all="8">
      <icon icon="{{ template.icon }}" size="24" color="{{ data(colors).black }}"/>
    </padding>
    <positioned all="0">
      <material type="transparency">
        <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
        <inkWell onPressed="browser: {{ template.link }}">
          <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
        </inkWell>
      </material>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</template>

<template id="buttons.justButton">
  <stack>
    <container color="{{ template.color }}">
      <prop:decoration>
        <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
      </prop:decoration>
      <padding all="16">
        <center>
          <text color="{{ template.textColor }}" size="18">
            {{ template.text }}
          </text>
        </center>
      </padding>
    </container>
    <positioned all="0">
      <material type="transparency">
        <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
        <inkWell onPressed="{{ template.onPressed }}">
          <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
        </inkWell>
      </material>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</template>

<template id="buttons.form">
  <column>
    <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).transparentGrey }}"
               text="If you are interested in communication with us, please - fill the form below"/>
    <divider height="12"/>
    <component id="buttons.justButton" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}"
               textColor="{{ data(colors).white }}" text="FILL GOOGLE FORM"
               onPressed="browser: https://forms.gle/waAR9GVPB4cESTL99"/>
  </column>
</template>

<template id="buttons.squareIcon">
  <stack>
    <container color="{{ template.color }}">
      <prop:decoration>
        <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
      </prop:decoration>
      <padding all="16">
        <center>
          <icon icon="{{ template.icon }}" color="{{ template.iconColor }}" size="26"/>
        </center>
      </padding>
    </container>
    <positioned all="0">
      <material type="transparency">
        <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
        <inkWell onPressed="{{ template.onPressed }}">
          <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
        </inkWell>
      </material>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</template>

<template id="buttons.cms">
  <row>
    <expanded>
      <fadeIn duration="300">
        <component id="buttons.justButton" color="#FFF76707" textColor="#FFFFFF" text="Let's play" onPressed="browser: https://admin.nanc.io"/>
      </fadeIn>
    </expanded>
    <divider width="8"/>
    <fadeIn delay="100" duration="300">
      <tooltip text="Share the link">
        <component id="buttons.squareIcon" color="#FFF76707" iconColor="#FFFFFF" icon="flu_share_android_filled" onPressed="share: https://admin.nanc.io"/>
      </tooltip>
    </fadeIn>
  </row>
</template>

<!-- ? ========================= Texts ========================= -->
<template id="text.h0">
  <text align="{{ template.align }}">
    <prop:textStyle color="{{ template.color }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" weight="w700" size="31.25" height="1.5"/>
    {{ template.text }}
  </text>
</template>

<template id="text.h1">
  <text align="{{ template.align }}">
    <prop:textStyle color="{{ template.color }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" weight="bold" size="25" height="1.5"/>
    {{ template.text }}
  </text>
</template>

<template id="text.h2">
  <text>
    <prop:textStyle color="{{ template.color }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" weight="w600" size="20" height="1.5"/>
    {{ template.text }}
  </text>
</template>

<template id="text.h7">
  <text align="{{ template.align }}">
    <prop:textStyle color="{{ template.color }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" size="16" height="1.5"/>
    {{ template.text }}
  </text>
</template>

<!-- ? ========================= Cards ========================= -->
<template id="cards.bullet">
  <container>
    <prop:decoration color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
      <prop:shadow color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" blurRadius="12" spreadRadius="-10"/>
      <prop:borderRadius all="10"/>
    </prop:decoration>
    <padding all="20">
      <row crossAxisAlignment="start">
        <padding top="4">
          <container width="20" height="20">
            <prop:decoration color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
              <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
            </prop:decoration>
            <center>
              <icon icon="mdi_check_bold" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" size="12"/>
            </center>
          </container>
        </padding>
        <divider width="18"/>
        <expanded>
          <column crossAxisAlignment="start">
            <component id="text.h2" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="{{ template.title }}"/>
            <divider height="4"/>
            <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" text="{{ template.text }}"/>
          </column>
        </expanded>
      </row>
    </padding>
  </container>
</template>

<template id="cards.feature">
  <column>
    <padding bottom="32">
      <center>
        <icon icon="{{ template.icon }}" size="45" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
      </center>
    </padding>
    <padding left="16" right="16" bottom="18">
      <component id="text.h1" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" text="{{ template.title }}" align="center"/>
    </padding>
    <padding left="40" right="40">
      <text align="center">
        <prop:textStyle color="{{ data(colors).white }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" size="16" height="1.5"/>
        {{ template.text }}
      </text>
    </padding>
  </column>
</template>

<template id="cards.metric">
  <container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
    <prop:decoration>
      <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
    </prop:decoration>
    <padding all="12">
      <column crossAxisAlign="center" mainAxisSize="min">
        <padding bottom="12">
          <icon icon="{{ template.icon }}" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
        </padding>
        <padding bottom="8">
          <component id="text.h2" text="{{ template.numbers }}" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
        </padding>
        <component id="text.h7" text="{{ template.text }}" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
      </column>
    </padding>
  </container>
</template>

<template id="cards.dev">
  <container color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
    <prop:decoration>
      <prop:borderRadius all="12"/>
      <prop:shadow color="{{ data(colors).black }}" blurRadius="12" spreadRadius="-10"/>
    </prop:decoration>
    <padding left="20" top="40" right="20" bottom="40">
      <column mainAxisSize="min">
        <stack>
          <container size="220" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
            <prop:decoration>
              <prop:borderRadius all="200"/>
            </prop:decoration>
          </container>
          <positioned all="0">
            <center>
              <container size="214" color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
                <prop:decoration>
                  <prop:borderRadius all="200"/>
                </prop:decoration>
              </container>
            </center>
          </positioned>
          <positioned all="0">
            <center>
              <sizedBox size="200">
                <clipRRect all="100">
                  <image ref="{{ template.image }}" fit="cover"/>
                </clipRRect>
              </sizedBox>
            </center>
          </positioned>
        </stack>
        <padding top="66">
          <component id="text.h0" text="{{ template.name }}" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" align="center"/>
        </padding>
        <padding bottom="14">
          <component id="text.h2" text="{{ template.role }}" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" align="center"/>
        </padding>
        <padding bottom="30">
          <component id="text.h7" text="{{ template.description }}" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" align="center"/>
        </padding>
        <row mainAxisAlignment="spaceEvenly">
          <show show="{{ template.fb }}">
            <component id="buttons.icon" icon="rmx_facebook_fill" link="{{ template.fb }}"/>
          </show>

          <show show="{{ template.inst }}">
            <component id="buttons.icon" icon="rmx_instagram_fill" link="{{ template.inst }}"/>
          </show>

          <show show="{{ template.tw }}">
            <component id="buttons.icon" icon="mdi_twitter" link="{{ template.tw }}"/>
          </show>

          <show show="{{ template.ytb }}">
            <component id="buttons.icon" icon="rmx_youtube_fill" link="{{ template.ytb }}"/>
          </show>
        </row>
      </column>
    </padding>
  </container>
</template>

<template id="cards.review">
  <container>
    <prop:decoration color="#FFFFFF">
      <prop:borderRadius all="10"/>
      <prop:shadow color="#80000000" blurRadius="20" spreadRadius="-10"/>
    </prop:decoration>

    <padding left="16" top="20" right="16" bottom="20">
      <column mainAxisSize="min">
        <clipRRect all="50">
          <sizedBox size="50">
            <image ref="{{ template.image }}" fit="cover"/>
          </sizedBox>
        </clipRRect>
        <divider height="12"/>
        <text>
          <prop:textStyle font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" size="25" height="1.5" weight="w600"/>
          {{ template.name }}
        </text>
        <text>
          <prop:textStyle font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" size="16" height="1.5" weight="w400"/>
          {{ template.position }}
        </text>
        <divider height="18"/>
        <tooltip text="{{ template.review }}">
          <text color="#6C6C72" align="center" maxLines="10" overflow="ellipsis">
            <prop:textStyle font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" size="16" height="1.5" weight="w400"/>
            {{ template.review }}
          </text>
        </tooltip>
      </column>
    </padding>
  </container>
</template>

<template id="cards.image">
  <aspectRatio ratio="0.4618">
    <container>
      <prop:decoration>
        <prop:borderRadius all="28"/>
        <prop:shadow color="#A6000000" blurRadius="12" spreadRadius="-1"/>
      </prop:decoration>

      <clipRRect all="30">
        <image ref="{{ template.image }}"/>
      </clipRRect>
    </container>
  </aspectRatio>
</template>

<!-- ? ========================= Other templates ========================= -->
<template id="slider.dot">
  <stack>
    <sizedBox size="22">
    </sizedBox>

    <show show="{{ template.active }}">
      <positioned all="0">
        <align align="center">
          <container width="22" height="22" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
            <prop:decoration>
              <prop:borderRadius all="50"/>
            </prop:decoration>
          </container>
        </align>
      </positioned>
    </show>

    <positioned all="0">
      <align align="center">
        <container width="20" height="20" color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="50"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </align>
    </positioned>

    <positioned all="0">
      <align align="center">
        <container width="16" height="16" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="50"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </align>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</template>

<template id="divider.line">
  <container width="1" height="23" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}">
  </container>
</template>

<!-- ? ========================= UI ========================= -->

<!-- ? ========================= Top block ========================= -->
<container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
  <padding left="16" top="50" right="16" bottom="40">
    <stack>
      <positioned left="20" top="0" right="0" bottom="0">
        <container color="#7472FE">
          <padding all="10">
            <container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
            </container>
          </padding>
        </container>
      </positioned>
      <padding top="20" right="20" bottom="20">
        <container>
          <prop:decoration color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
          </prop:decoration>
          <prop:padding left="18" top="30" bottom="30" right="18"/>
          <column crossAxisAlignment="start">
            <component id="text.h1" text="{{ page.main_header }}" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}"/>
            <divider height="18"/>
            <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" text="{{ page.top_block_text }}"/>
            <divider height="30"/>
            <component id="text.h2" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="{{ page.download_apps_header }}"/>
            <divider height="12"/>
            <row>
              <expanded>
                <component id="buttons.store" link="{{ data(stores).googleLink }}" image="{{ data(stores).googleBadge }}"/>
              </expanded>
              <divider width="12"/>
              <expanded>
                <component id="buttons.store" link="{{ data(stores).appleLink }}" image="{{ data(stores).appleBadge }}"/>
              </expanded>
            </row>
            <padding top="40" bottom="18" color="">
              <component id="text.h2" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="AND PLAY WITH CMS"/>
              <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).transparentGrey }}" text="available only for desktops now"/>
            </padding>
            <component id="buttons.cms"/>
          </column>
        </container>
      </padding>
    </stack>
  </padding>
  <fadeIn>
    <padding left="55" right="55" top="40" bottom="60">
      <component id="cards.image" image="{{ page.images.0.image.url }}"/>
    </padding>
  </fadeIn>
</container>

<!-- ? ========================= About Nanc ========================= -->
<padding top="60" bottom="18">
  <center>
    <component id="text.h1" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="{{ page.about_header }}"/>
  </center>
</padding>

<padding left="38" right="38" bottom="18">
  <center>
    <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" text="{{ page.about_text }}"/>
  </center>
</padding>

<padding left="38" right="38" bottom="40">
  <component id="buttons.form"/>
</padding>

<padding left="68" right="68" bottom="40">
  <component id="cards.image" image="{{ page.images.1.image.url }}"/>
</padding>

<!-- ? ========================= Bullets ========================= -->
<for valueName="bullet" in="{{ page.bullets }}">
  <padding left="16" right="16" bottom="20">
    <component id="cards.bullet"
               title="{{ cycle.bullet.title }}"
               text="{{ cycle.bullet.description }}"
    />
  </padding>
</for>
<divider height="70"/>

<!-- ? ========================= Features ========================= -->
<container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
  <padding top="60" bottom="18">
    <center>
      <component id="text.h1" text="{{ page.features_header }}" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
    </center>
  </padding>

  <padding left="40" right="40" bottom="32">
    <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" align="center"
               text="{{ page.features_text }}"/>
  </padding>

  <padding bottom="60">
    <for valueName="feature" in="{{ page.features }}" to="3">
      <padding bottom="32">
        <component id="cards.feature"
                   title="{{ cycle.feature.title }}"
                   text="{{ cycle.feature.description }}"
                   icon="{{ cycle.feature.image }}"/>
      </padding>
    </for>
  </padding>

  <padding left="60" right="60" bottom="120">
    <component id="cards.image" image="{{ page.images.2.image.url }}"/>
  </padding>

  <padding bottom="60">
    <for valueName="feature" in="{{ page.features }}" from="3">
      <padding bottom="32">
        <component id="cards.feature"
                   title="{{ cycle.feature.title }}"
                   text="{{ cycle.feature.description }}"
                   icon="{{ cycle.feature.image }}"/>
      </padding>
    </for>
  </padding>
</container>

<!-- ? ========================= About interface ========================= -->
<padding top="60" bottom="18">
  <component id="text.h1" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="{{ page.interface_header }}" align="center"/>
</padding>

<padding left="40" right="40" bottom="18">
  <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" align="center"
             text="{{ page.interface_text }}"/>
</padding>

<padding left="40" right="40" bottom="40">
  <component id="buttons.form"/>
</padding>

<padding bottom="60">
  <carouselSlider dotColor="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}" sliderDotGap="20" height="700">
    <for valueName="image" in="{{ page.images }}">
      <component id="cards.image" image="{{ cycle.image.image.url }}"/>
    </for>
  </carouselSlider>
</padding>

<!-- ? ========================= Middle downloading block ========================= -->
<padding left="16" right="90" bottom="18">
  <component id="text.h1" text="{{ page.download_apps_header }}" color="{{ data(colors).black }}"/>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="40">
  <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}"
             text="{{ page.middle_download_block_text }}"/>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="20">
  <row mainAxisAlignment="spaceBetween">
    <expanded>
      <component id="buttons.store" link="{{ data(stores).googleLink }}" image="{{ data(stores).googleBadge }}"/>
    </expanded>
    <divider width="25"/>
    <expanded>
      <component id="buttons.store" link="{{ data(stores).appleLink }}" image="{{ data(stores).appleBadge }}"/>
    </expanded>
  </row>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="60">
  <component id="buttons.cms"/>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16">
  <row mainAxisAlignment="spaceBetween">
    <expanded>
      <component id="cards.metric" numbers="59865" text="Download" icon="mdi_download_box"/>
    </expanded>

    <divider width="16"/>

    <expanded>
      <component id="cards.metric" numbers="29852" text="Like" icon="flu_thumb_like_filled"/>
    </expanded>

    <divider width="16"/>

    <expanded>
      <component id="cards.metric" numbers="1500" text="5 Stars" icon="flu_star_emphasis_filled"/>
    </expanded>
  </row>
</padding>

<padding left="20" top="60" right="20" bottom="60">
  <component id="cards.image" image="{{ page.images.4.image.url }}"/>
</padding>

<!-- ? ========================= How to use app ========================= -->
<padding bottom="60">
  <stack>
    <padding bottom="100">
      <container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
        <column>
          <padding top="60" bottom="40">
            <component id="text.h1" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" align="center"
                       text="{{ page.how_to_use_header }}"/>
          </padding>
          <padding left="40" right="40" bottom="120">
            <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" align="center"
                       text="{{ page.how_to_use_text }}"/>
          </padding>
        </column>
      </container>
    </padding>
    <positioned left="16" bottom="0" right="16">
      <aspectRatio  ratio="1.7777">
        <physicalModel elevation="8">
          <clipRRect all="12">
            <stack fit="expand">
              <image ref="https://corsproxy.io?https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Hu5S4kC84qY/hqdefault.jpg" fit="fitWidth"/>
              <positioned all="0">
                <container color="#665856E9">
                </container>
              </positioned>
              <positioned all="0">
                <center>
                  <component id="buttons.play" videoLink="https://youtu.be/Hu5S4kC84qY"/>
                </center>
              </positioned>
            </stack>
          </clipRRect>
        </physicalModel>
      </aspectRatio>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</padding>

<!-- ? ========================= About "team" ========================= -->
<padding bottom="18">
  <component id="text.h1" text="{{ page.team_header }}" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" align="center"/>
</padding>

<padding left="40" right="40" bottom="40">
  <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" align="center"
             text="{{ page.team_text }}"/>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="20">
  <column mainAxisSize="min">
    <for valueName="dev" in="{{ page.team_members }}">
      <padding bottom="30">
        <component id="cards.dev"
                   role="{{ cycle.dev.team_member.position_new.position }}"
                   name="{{ cycle.dev.team_member.name }} {{ cycle.dev.team_member.second_name }}"
                   image="{{ cycle.dev.team_member.image }}"
                   description="{{ cycle.dev.team_member.description }}"
                   fb="{{ cycle.dev.team_member.facebook }}"
                   inst="{{ cycle.dev.team_member.instagram }}"
                   tw="{{ cycle.dev.team_member.twitter }}"
                   ytb="{{ cycle.dev.team_member.youtube }}"
        />
      </padding>
    </for>
  </column>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="40">
  <component id="buttons.form"/>
</padding>

<!-- ? ========================= Customers reviews ========================= -->
<padding>
  <container>
    <prop:decoration color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
    </prop:decoration>

    <column mainAxisSize="min">
      <padding top="60" bottom="18">
        <component id="text.h1" text="{{ page.customers_header }}" align="center" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
      </padding>

      <padding left="40" right="40" bottom="32">
        <component id="text.h7" align="center" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"
                   text="{{ page.customers_text }}"/>
      </padding>

      <padding bottom="60">
        <!-- ? PRESS "HELP" BUTTON ON THE TOP RIGHT CORNER AND FIND "CAROUSEL SLIDER" WIDGET TO READ MANUAL -->
        <carouselSlider height="500" dotColor="{{ data(colors).white }}" sliderDotGap="20">
          <for valueName="rev" in="{{ page.reviews }}">
            <component id="cards.review" name="{{ cycle.rev.customer_name }} {{ cycle.rev.customer_lastname }}"
                       position="{{ cycle.rev.position_new.position }}" image="{{ cycle.rev.image }}"
                       review="{{ cycle.rev.review }}"/>
          </for>
        </carouselSlider>
      </padding>

      <text align="center" size="10" color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
        version: {{ page.updated_at }}
      </text>
    </column>
  </container>
</padding>

main_header: NANC - IS THE REINVENTION OF CMS
top_block_text: Nanc is a completely new approach to managing your data. Nanc allows you to integrate with any of your existing backends in a matter of hours with interactive documentation
about_text: Nanc allows you to manage data of any complexity. If your data can be represented as JSON - Nanc can help you. And since Nanc does not depend on a backend implementation, you can use anything as a backend: JSON file, SQLite, Firebase, Supabase and any "classic" backend or anything else! Hell, you can use Nanc in parallel with your current CMS to compare features and you don't have to "rewrite" anything
features_text: Everything you see here can be any screen in your application. You can use NANC to create all the screens, quickly test hypotheses, and update your application in minutes. And that's just the beginning!
interface_text: Nanc allows you to implement a mobile application interface in Flutter of almost any complexity (so far). Everything you're reading was done with Nanc in a little over 2 hours. This content can be completely modified to update your app without publishing to the App Store or Google Play. Website publishing experience becomes available for Flutter apps
middle_download_block_text: If you're reading this text from your desktop, look at the same Android or iOS app. (Actually, the iOS app is not available yet, I don't have an extra $100 for Apple 🤑)
how_to_use_text: All you see is a technical preview of Nanc and a demo app showing some of the features and with all that you can play with! Below is a link to a video that shows in detail how to interact with the Nanc playground
team_text: It's a demo, how can you do without humor in it? Below are the main Nanc developers, without whom everything you see would not have been created
customers_text: And since we're talking about such a cool product like Nanc, of course, it will have a lot of enthusiastic customers, whose reviews, with their permission, we have posted below

bullets.title: CREATED WITH UNDERSTANDING OF NEEDS
bullets.description: Nanc is a product created by developers with extensive experience in creating both applications and content management systems. We felt all the pain that you felt and we want to fix it!

bullets.title: INCREDIBLE FLEXIBILITY AND POSSIBILITIES
bullets.description: Nanc allows you to express data of any complexity in the form of convenient forms, with which you will manage everything. If your data can be represented in JSON form, it means it can be managed in Nanc!

bullets.title: FASTEST SPEED OF INTEGRATION
bullets.description: To start using Nanc its takes only several hours of work of Frontend or Mobile developer. The very next day you will be able to manage all your data in the most accessible way with Nanc

bullets.title: UNREACHABLE TIME TO MARKET
bullets.description: When you use all the features of Nanc, you will leave your competitors far behind! Details will be below 😉

features.title: FLEXIBLE ACCESS CONFIGURATION
features.description:
You can configure access rules for any entity and any field! You no longer have to worry that your new employee will accidentally delete something or see something that is too early for them to see
IN DEVELOPMENT*

features.title: BACKEND-AGNOSTIC
features.description: Nanc can act as a CMS for any existing backend. You don't have to use an imposed solution to manage your data or rewrite it from scratch

features.title: FLUTTER CODE PUSH
features.description: Nanc allows you to update the interface of your application written in Flutter without publishing the application in the stores. For now, it is possible to update the straightforward UI and logic, and we are actively working to make it as quick and easy as possible for you to test any new hypothesis and not wait for Apple or Google to check your app!

features.title: FREE FOR NOW
features.description: If you are a small company and want to try Nanc, and even if you are a big one, fill out the form and we will definitely contact you and agree on a win-win cooperation!

features.title: INCREASED SAFETY
features.description:
You can prohibit copying any (or individual) data in Nanc, so that the employee cannot take away important information! (Don't forget to take his cell phone away)
IN DEVELOPMENT*

features.title: SIMPLE AND UNDERSTANDABLE UI SYNTAX
features.description: Nanc makes it easy to describe the application interface in Flutter using clear and simple XML syntax. Now to create a new screen in your application, you don't even need to use a programmer!

team_member.name: Rachel
team_member.description: I am a skilled UI/UX designer with a passion for creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces. I have a strong understanding of user psychology and am able to effectively communicate my designs to team members and stakeholders. I am constantly learning and staying up-to-date with the latest design trends and best practices.

team_member.name: Will
team_member.description: As a manager, I am responsible for leading and guiding a team towards success. I have excellent communication and leadership skills, and am able to set clear goals and delegate tasks effectively. I am able to analyze data and make informed decisions, and am a strong problem-solver able to adapt to changing circumstances.

team_member.name: Robert
team_member.description: I am a highly skilled mobile app developer with a passion for creating innovative and engaging apps. I excel at solving complex technical challenges and delivering high-quality apps on time and within budget.

reviews.review: I have been using NANC CMS for the past year and I must say, it is hands-down the best CMS I have ever used. The interface is user-friendly and intuitive, making it easy for me to manage my website's content without any prior technical knowledge. The feature set is extensive, offering everything I need to create a professional and dynamic website. The customer support team is also top-notch, always available to answer my questions and provide assistance when needed. Overall, I highly recommend NANC CMS to anyone looking for a powerful and reliable content management system.

Hey, have you heard of NANC? It's this amazing CMS that I've been using and it's been a game-changer for my business. We've seen 200% growth every year since we started using it. I highly recommend checking it out if you're in the market for a new CMS.

I wanted to share a content management system that has completely transformed my business. It's called NANC, and it's seriously impressive. One of the things that sets NANC apart is its flexibility. It can integrate with just any backend system, which has been super convenient for us. And get this – it also has a feature that lets you update Flutter apps without publishing to the app store. That's not something you see every day! But it's not just about the bells and whistles – NANC is also really user-friendly and can handle a wide range of content types and formats. And of course, it's reliable and secure, which is a must for any business. I've been blown away by NANC and think it's a game-changer for anyone looking for a robust and flexible CMS. Give it a try – you won't be disappointed.

Content Management Systems: A Case Study of NANC. Content management systems (CMSs) are an integral part of many modern businesses, providing a platform for creating and publishing digital content. In this case study, we will examine the effectiveness of NANC, a CMS that has significantly impacted the growth and efficiency of our organization.
NANC stands out among other CMSs due to its flexibility and ability to integrate with various backend systems. This has allowed us to seamlessly incorporate NANC into our existing workflow and make updates to our content without the need for additional resources.
In addition, NANC offers a unique feature that allows for the update of Flutter apps without the need for publishing to the app store. This has greatly reduced the time and effort required to make changes to our mobile applications, leading to increased productivity and customer satisfaction.
Overall, NANC has proven to be a reliable and user-friendly CMS that has significantly contributed to the growth of our business. We highly recommend NANC to other organizations seeking a flexible and efficient platform for managing digital content.

Attention tech investors: have you heard of NANC? It's a content management system that is quickly gaining traction in the market and has the potential to be a game-changer for businesses of all sizes.

What sets NANC apart is its flexibility and ability to integrate with any backend system. This makes it a versatile solution for managing digital content and allows for seamless integration into existing workflows.

But NANC's real standout feature is its ability to update Flutter apps without the need for publishing to the app store. This saves time and resources, and has the potential to revolutionize the way businesses make changes to their mobile applications.

In terms of performance, NANC is reliable and user-friendly, with a wide range of capabilities for handling different content types and formats. It's also secure, which is crucial for protecting sensitive data.

Overall, we believe NANC is a promising technology solution with significant growth potential. If you're looking for a startup to invest in, we highly recommend giving NANC a closer look
